name.k: Tinybop 開發的天氣應用程式
天気 ~ あそんでまなぼう

platformAttributes.ios.subtitle.k: 子供のための気象学 - 学び、遊ぶ

platformAttributes.ios.editorialNotes.ta.k: 呼风唤雨 探寻气候奥秘
互動探索天氣，感受大自然力量
Play with sun, wind, and air

platformAttributes.ios.editorialNotes.st.k: Once again, the creators of The Human Body and Simple Machines have turned playtime into a rich learning experience. Tinybop’s sandbox-style app lets kids experiment to their hearts’ content—seeing what happens when they move the sun, whip up winds, and cause rainstorms. A zoomed-out view illustrates the broader water cycle at work, while fascinating closeups show things like the effects of changing temperatures and strengthening tornadoes on everyday life. We also dig the detailed study guide offering extra info and discussion ideas.
